item.title: Podcast: Kelly Forrister - The Sassy Ladies Interview
item.itunes:author: Kelly Forrister
item.itunes:subtitle: The Sassy Ladies podcast interview The David Allen Company's Kelly Forrister
item.itunes:summary: Kelly Forrister teaches seminars and provides individual coaching for clients worldwide. She teaches David Allen's "Getting Things Done", and has been working with his methodology for more than 15 years. Listen in as Kelly shares some of her passion... <!-- -->
item.description:
Kelly Forrister teaches seminars and provides individual coaching for clients worldwide. She teaches David Allen's "Getting Things Done", and has been working with his methodology for more than 15 years. Listen in as Kelly shares some of her passion... Click here to listen now or click here to download. (mp3, 32:24)

item.title: Podcast: How to Organize Project Actions
item.itunes:author: info@davidco.com (David Allen)
item.itunes:subtitle: Keys To Effective Project Management
item.itunes:summary: GTD Facilitator Kelly Forrister interviews David about some of the keys to project management. One of the most commonly asked questions about GTD is how to manage discrete next actions within projects. <!-- -->

item.title: Podcast: Productive Talk on GTD 2.0
item.itunes:author: info@davidco.com (David Allen)
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode eight of Productive Talk, a joint podcast series featuring audio of conversations between David Allen and Merlin Mann.
item.itunes:summary: David and Merlin talk about how people's understanding of GTD evolves over time, future plans for making GTD easier for people to start and maintain, and the importance of learning to pay attention to your higher altitudes. <!-- -->
item.description:
David and Merlin talk about how people's understanding of GTD evolves over time, future plans for making GTD easier for people to start and maintain, and the importance of learning to pay attention to your higher altitudes. Click here to listen now or click here to download. (mp3, 13:11)

item.title: Podcast: Productive Talk on Implementing GTD

item.itunes:subtitle: Episode seven of Productive Talk, a joint podcast series featuring audio of conversations between David Allen and Merlin Mann.
item.itunes:summary: David and Merlin talk about best practices for implementing Getting Things Done. David shares some great advice on firewalling review time and warns us how to avoid the perils of "cruise control." <!-- -->
item.description:

item.title: Podcast: Productive Talk on Someday Maybe
item.itunes:author: info@davidco.com (David Allen)
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode three of Productive Talk, a joint podcast series featuring audio of conversations between David Allen and Merlin Mann.
item.itunes:summary: David and Merlin talk about the subtly powerful someday/maybe list, and look at best practices for the project list and support materials filing. David also gives a deeper cut on why you should capture 100% of whatever has your attention. <!-- -->
item.description:
